title: Wages and GDP in England 1500-2000, chart

content.prompt: Which of the following was the most direct cause of the change in typical working hours between 1500 and 1750?

choices.label: The growth of a new industrial elite
The transfer of new crops from the Americas to Europe as part of the Columbian Exchange
Population losses as a result of the English Civil War
The lifting of traditional restrictions on economic activity as part of the growth of a market economy

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
